## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5de1d1e2140e353329354c268f3866da72c3edffdf57c0bae8c64c285b120a4c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'barcodegeneratorqr' @ 1.0.3 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
